root.name: ABC Sports Presents: The Palm Springs Open
root.description: OverviewABC Sports Presents: The Palm Springs Open is a golfing game developed by Fathom Pictures, Inc. and published by Philips Interactive Media, Inc. for the CD-i in 1991.GameplayABC Sports Presents: The Palm Springs Open is played across 18 holes, based on the real life Palm Springs course. The course backgrounds while playing are real world pictures, as are the golfers.Each time the player steps up to the ball a club can be chosen. After the club has been chosen the aim is set and then a power meter slides back and forth. When the player presses the button the power is set and the ball is hit.
